name: Coin Vortex
description:
You're a coin in, stay alive as long as possible! 

Controls:

- Left / Right Arrow Keys to nudge

- Spacebar to change view

Made in 3 hours for Trijam 154, prompt: "There's a twist!"

Source code: https://github.com/haxiomic/coin-vortex-trijam

----

What went well

- Happy that my haxe + three setup was productive and I could get the fundamentals down early

What needs work

- Need to plan the physics and vector math better, I did minimal planning there and was slow to figure out things like aligning the coin and camera to the surface nicely

Things I planned but didn't make it in the 3h

- Other coins to avoid that collide with you

- UI and high score

- Better coin physics!

- Audio! The sound these things make as the coin reaches warp speed is something I'm sad to miss!
